TouristPlaces.Name: Triveni Ghat
TouristPlaces.Description: Elaborate statues & other structures line this spiritual site on the banks of the Ganges River.

TouristPlaces.Name: Parmarth Niketan Ashram
TouristPlaces.Description: Spacious Himalayan ashram with lush gardens, offering courses in yoga, meditation & Ayurveda.

TouristPlaces.Name: Ram Jhula
TouristPlaces.Description: Ram Jhula is an iconic suspension bridge offering stunning views of the Ganges and the surrounding temples. It's a sacred passage for pilgrims and a must-visit for experiencing the spiritual essence of Rishikesh.

TouristPlaces.Name: Rishikesh Trip.
TouristPlaces.Description: Embark on a spiritual journey in Rishikesh, the Yoga Capital of the World. Discover ancient temples, serene ghats, and the holy Ganges River, immersing yourself in the divine atmosphere of this sacred town.

TouristPlaces.Name: HimShail WaterFall
TouristPlaces.Description: Escape the spiritual hustle and find tranquility at HimShail Waterfall. While not directly religious, the serene natural beauty offers a peaceful space for reflection and connecting with nature's divine presence.

TouristPlaces.Name: Goa Beach Rishikesh
TouristPlaces.Description: Experience the unique blend of spirituality and relaxation at Goa Beach Rishikesh. Though named after the coastal paradise, this riverside spot offers a tranquil place to meditate by the Ganges, absorbing the holy vibrations of Rishikesh.

TouristPlaces.Name: Patna Waterfall
TouristPlaces.Description: Find serenity amidst nature's beauty at Patna Waterfall, a short trek from Lakshman Jhula. While not a religious site, the peaceful ambiance and the sound of cascading water create a meditative atmosphere, perfect for spiritual contemplation.

TouristPlaces.Name: Tapovan Public Ghat
TouristPlaces.Description: Tapovan Public Ghat is a serene spot along the Ganges, ideal for peaceful reflection and spiritual cleansing. Take a dip in the holy waters or simply sit by the riverbank and absorb the divine energy of Rishikesh.

TouristPlaces.Name: Aastha Path Rishikesh
TouristPlaces.Description: Aastha Path is a dedicated walking path along the Ganges, perfect for a contemplative stroll. Enjoy the scenic views and the soothing sounds of the river as you connect with your inner self and the spiritual atmosphere of Rishikesh.

TouristPlaces.Name: Triveni Ghat Walking Area
TouristPlaces.Description: Experience the vibrant atmosphere of Triveni Ghat with a leisurely walk along the river. Witness the evening Ganga Aarti ceremony and immerse yourself in the devotional energy that permeates this sacred space.
